description: The Hiking Core Cap is similar to the Hiking Core but with added details, giving it a heritage look. A leather toe rand runs above the sole, for extra support in all conditions. The boot is made from premium European materials, robust genuine leather or soft suede, and with an EVA rubber sole. It's a durable and comfortable choice for all hiking activities.
name: Mono Hiking Core Cap, Suede, Leather Lining - Mens
